rajaya eya piligath athara eya satan wirama giwisumak magin thahawuru karana ladde ya. 2002 pebarawari 27 wenida rajaya saha eltitieeya athara athsan kerunu satan wirama giwisumen ethek thama kriyakarakam sandaha kisidu wagawimak ho wagakimak nomathiwa siti eltitiee sanwidhanaya awama washayen thaman athsan kala satan wirama giwisume waganthi aaraksha kirimata bandi sitina parshawayak bawata path karanu labini. 2002 desambar 16 wenida rajaya saha eltitiee ya athara sakachcha aarambha kerunu athara eeta pera desambar 01 da ranil indiya sancharayaka yedune ya.

eya parani kramaye pawathi gatumkari wathawaranaya sampurnayenma pasal ragar lig pitiyen iwath kirimata iwahal wanu atha.pasugiya tharagawaliye palamu kotase 'ee' kandayen tharaga wadunu isipathana, thrithwa, santha pithara, rajakiya, kingswud, santha joshap, widya widyalaya, santha anthoni, dharmaraja ha wesli widuhal samaga 'bi' kandaye idiriyenma siti kandayam 6k labana wasare lig tharagawaliye palamu kotase 'ee' kandayen tharaga wadithi.mulika wataye di 'ee' kandaye kandayam ek kotasakata hathara bagin kotas 4kin tharaga wadina athara ema wataya awasanaye sama kotasakinma idiriyen pasuwana kandayam deka kusalana wataye ardha awasan purwa tharagawalata ekwethi.
